item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 3:25 AM UTC
item.description:

10. uBlock Origin is no longer available on Chrome web store (37 points | 9 comments)

20. 40 Years Ago, Drexel Made Computer – and Apple – History (26 points | 8 comments)

23. Learn Git Branching (169 points | 49 comments)

27. Randomness extractors: making fair coins out of biased coins (69 points | 25 comments)
